I'm not sure, sir. The second one probably? What about that "decorative monstrosity" you mentioned earlier?
I already called dibs on being part of the monstrosity. You can't take it back.
Keep it up and you just might get promoted.
Well done, sir! It's an honor to take your orders!
Couldn't have done it better myself.
Wowee! A free land version!?
Free stuff is the best kind of stuff!
You know what's fun? The total domination of a battlefield!
I've finally done it, Floyd. This new ammo is sure to change everythin'!
Hmm, the cartridge load seems somewhat unstable, Zoey. Not that I don't share in your enthusiasm for the potential here, but I think some testing might be in order before we make such bold claims.
Well, not every shot is gonna cause small mushroom clouds on the battlefield, but when this thing works… just don't stand near your target. Still, havin' a quick test's a good idea.
Lead the way, young Zoey! Field work is so exciting!
Perhaps we should move that test a bit further from the Outpost...
Well, that was entertaining and educational! Like you said, not every round causes maximum devastation, but when it hits, it REALLY does a number on the target area!
Yep! Pretty much obliteratin' anythin' in its path! And we haven't even tested the 'Unstable Round' yet!
I set up some decommissioned tanks for ya ta shoot!
Uh, sir? Those soldiers that Ramsey ordered to have a digging contest may have dug a little too greedily and too deep. They've awoken something. Something terrible.
What is it now?
All I'm seeing is a giant shadowy flamey thing. Oh crap...
I want no part in this.
Oh god! It's pure terror! It'll destroy us all! These are the end times!
But it's sooooo cute! Can I have one, LT? I'll feed it and walk it every day! I swear!
You people can do whatever you want with that nameless horror.
Hai mai pensato, 'Quello che davvero manca all'Avamposto è un'arena dove potersi godere degli amichevoli spargimenti di sangue con altri Avamposti, senza impelagarsi nel caos di una guerra?'
I was going to say clean drinking water and worker's compensation, but I suppose we all have different, often incorrect, priorities.
An arena WOULD improve our strategic positioning and my general cheerfulness.
Seriously, you too? We're really going to build an arena, and not, you know, a working irrigation system? Or some proper roofing for the orphanage so they're not all crushed in their sleep?
Yeah, let's go build an arena!
When the arena is built, we'll be able to fight other Outposts' battle formations.
...What?
Well, I think I've really outdone myself. This arena is a thing of beauty.
It's casting a shadow so big the Buddha Hand crops are withering.
Floyd, you need to think of the big picture. You need to think, any moment now, I'll be watching Perkins run for his life from a pleather front-row seat. While I'm sipping on a mojito. And laughing.
So, let's get going. I'm ready to watch people fight for my amusement.
So, we got an arena.
First, we'll need to place our defense formation.
This already sounds like too many obstacles.
After our formation is set up, then others can battle us. And we can battle THEM.
Set up your defense formation and then enter a battle.
Why y'all lookin' at me like I said somethin' wrong?
Well, that battle was invigorating.
Y'know, the battles might be more interestin' if we added some kind of twist! How about floodin' the arena with lava? Oh, or buzzsaws!
Now that we've fought in the arena, I have the thirst for victory.
Perkins, I need a victory! I have THE THIRST. I need it! I crave it!
You're scaring me, sir.
Good, you need a little more fear in your life. It builds character.
Let's now see if we can win a few more battles.
It's really hard to be as intelligent as I am. I have to think of everything.
Sir, we should also check in every once in a while to see if our formation has won battles against other outposts.
Great, sounds like a job for Sarge. I'll stay here and oversee our victory parade preparations. Perkins, how is the victory flag coming along?
My fingers are bleeding.
Well, sew faster and the pain will be over faster!
Lieutenant Morgan, sir? We've received an anonymous cable from another Outpost.
It's been a while since we've heard from anyone else out here. What's it say?
It's a challenge, sir. They're questioning our masculinity and saying some derogatory things about our mothers. They also question whether we are "soldier enough" to meet them in the arena.
Hmmm, let me see that note... Soldier enough?! Who do these chumps think they are? Wake the men and ready the defenses! We'll show them who's "soldier enough"!
After we've crushed everyone, we'll build a glorious statue honoring this victory!
Hahahahahaaaa! I mean, let's get that statue built.
We did it, Lieutenant. We won.
Yes, we've won once, but what about next time? We've got a long road ahead of us but I feel that with enough troops, time, and bullets, we can achieve total victory over everything!
That seems a bit megalomaniacal, sir.
Well done. Let's keep this momentum going.
These numbers are looking good! High command will be pleased.
Wow sir! You give me an ideal to strive for!
Questa è la Mappa. Per andare a Recoil Ridge, fai scorrere la mappa verso sud e cliccaci sopra.
Muoviamoci - Abbiamo un lungo viaggio da affrontare. Premi sulla Mappa.
Basta fare click sul pulsante "Base" per tornare  all'avamposto.

Clicca su "Partita Casuale" in basso allo schermo.
Altrimenti puoi visitare i tuoi amici e razziare il loro avamposto per rubare risorse preziose.
Cinghiali
Cinghiali
Cinghiali
Cinghiali
Clicca sul bottone "Costruisci" e poi sul Deposito Rifornimenti.
Ora cliccaci sopra per ottenere il tuo bottino! Andiamo - Aprilo!

Una volta completate le Tende, cliccaci ancora sopra per renderle abitabili.
In questo modo le persone potranno andare a lavorare nel Deposito Rifornimenti!
Oh, ma certo! Abbiamo bisogno di abitazioni per rendere produttivi i nostri edifici! Clicca sul tasto "Costruisci" e costruisci delle Tende.
Premi sui Soldati nel tuo Inventario per aggiungerli alla battaglia.
Adesso premi il pulsante "Combatti".
Seleziona la Caserma e poi premi "Addestra" per addestrare un Soldato.
Premi sul pulsante "Accelera" per completare subito l'addestramento del Soldato.
Premi su un'occupazione dei Predoni per respingerli dal tuo territorio!
Scout Predoni
Scout Predoni
but you've made it clear to me that I've been shirking my duties as a Civil Engineer.
Morgan, la minera di ferro è fantastica,
Really? Are you going to start with a sewer system? Please start with a sewer system.
No, I'm going to materially transform local topography, thus inducing development of a transportation infrastructure, thereby increasing efficiency in the translocation of raw goods.
You're doing what?
Captain, you'll find roads in the Decoration section of your Build Menu.
Inizierò a costruire delle strade sterrate.
Haulers will try to follow any roads you design, assuming your path makes more sense than just driving in the dirt.
Look at them go!
Il campo di prova per l'artiglieria è pronto - premi sull'incontro per combattere!
Se qualcuno rimane ferito, basta cliccare sull'ospedale per iniziare a curarlo.
Quando ti senti pronto, puoi cliccare sulla bandiera ed entrare nella mischia.
Uh...
But no, the Annual Winter Jubilee Charity Drive for Children is startin' up, and figured you folks might want to chip in.
Yeah, I feel like we're gonna be a "maybe", but the kind of "maybe" that sorta means "no"?
We try to encourage folks with some friendly competition. Biggest donor gets a prize.
I'm in.
Tradition is, folks just donate 'em right back. It's really more a formality than anything else–
I think the raptor is staring at me with its cold dead eyes, but it's hard to see past its glowing nose.
Colt
Keep donating troops, we will destroy those children with kindness!
You're so damn charitable, everyone will fear your name.
Ramsey insisted we put bows on the tanks to make them look festive.
Guns are like toys with consequences.
Purrface needs toys too, you know.
Keep donating! Make our enemies weep!
You're almost there! Let's show Sheriff Colt how damn charitable we are.
These toys are a burden to the environment.
So close! I can taste victory, and it's almost as good as whiskey.
I was the one who snuck the bees into Perkins' tent… don't tell anyone.
Anyone want to arm wrestle?
The point is to NOT remember.
Y'all are the worst friends a fella could ask for, but at least yer friends.
I said I wouldn't take part in libations, but I never said I wouldn't dance!
I just hope all my broken robots are in some kind'a robot heaven.
We're not allowed in the hall. But nobody said anything about raptors in disguises!
No, Floyd, I do not want to dance!
Captain Pike? What are you doing up here? Enjoying the winter of the Northern Frontier?
I wish that were the case, Lieutenant. While my home country isn't exactly warm, this type of winter is something we're not used to. I'm afraid we all may freeze to death without your assistance.
I'm sure we can give you a hand. And by "we" I mean not me.
Floyd! Why are you never around when I actually want you to be? Help Captain Pike here not freeze to death.
Have you tried dressing in layers?
You're not making it easy to like you.
So, you really think boots are that important? I always thought of them as simply a means to keep my feet off the ground.
That's why you keep needing our help, Pike. Boots make the man. Without a good pair of boots on your feet, you face certain defeat. I'm not trying to make a cute pun either. I mean it.
Also I hate puns.
Most intriguing, Lieutenant. I've always enjoyed a good pun myself.
Hey Perkins! Radio Captain Pike and let him know we'll be arriving at his port shortly with his winter gear.
Yes sir. I'll let him know immediately.
Wait a second, did Pike post a few ships outside his port to meet us? What am I looking at here?
They look like Sovereign ships, Lieutenant. Looks like they're about to attack Port City.
Perfect! For once, we have the element of surprise!
Where do all these holidays come from anyway?
These boots are excellent, Lieutenant. What do we owe you for compensation?
Under normal circumstances, this is the point where I would try to con you out of a bunch of your money. But seeing as it's the season for giving, consider it a Festivus gift.

Festivus? I assume this is a winter tradition of yours? We have one of those as well we call 'Boxes Day'. People are encouraged to buy their friends and family gifts, and to put them in boxes as a surprise.
Man, it's great to be back at the Outpost. I'm tired of always rushing to the aid of others. I say we impose some sort of base-wide non-interference policy. We can't be the police of everything.
It looks like some Sovereign ships followed us back to the Outpost, sir. Should I tell them we don't want to fight them and to leave us alone?
I mean, you can try, but I don't think they're gonna listen. I guess there's always the extremely slim chance they want to give us gifts for that Boxes Day thing Pike mentioned...
Maybe they'll leave if we turn off the lighthouse, like no one's home?
Tell him to shoot anyone that tries to wake me up.
That took care of 'em, Lieutenant. I don't see anymore ships in the harbor, at least.
That's good news, Ramsey. OK, are we safe for a few minutes? Can I go lie down now?
We appear to be, yeah.
Great. Make sure nobody bothers me for a while, and have Perkins stand guard outside my bedroom.
Did you enjoy your nap, sir?

Yeah I did, surprisingly. It doesn't look like anything caught fire while I was asleep, either. And now I see Captain Pike approaching. Great. I wonder what catastrophe he needs help avoiding this time.
Lieutenant Morgan! My men and I wanted to thank you for your recent generosity, so we brought you all some Boxes Day gifts. We hope you enjoy them!
Oh wow, is that it? No life threatening problems, or hostile factions after you?
Well, there was one other thing. It's a Boxes Day tradition to celebrate the times with copious amounts of food and alcohol!
Boxes Day sounds amazing!
Happy Holidays, Outpost!
OK, I've officially had too much to eat. Someone... who am I kidding, Perkins, get a wheelbarrow and roll me out of here. I'm too full to move.
Yes sir, I just need to digest for a minute…
Your cabin boy appears to have dozed off, Lieutenant. Would you like me to top off your glass?
Don't have to ask me twice! For once, I can say that I'm glad you stopped by!
Agguato Predone!
Dovrebbe finire in fretta.
Non posso credere che Morgan l'abbia fatto! Anzi, no, posso.
Ottenere una scorza d'arancia ben fatta è un'arte.
Predone Duellante
Quando hai abbastanza Pietra, clicca sul pulsante "Dona" all'interno di questa finestra per completare l'obiettivo!

Tragic news, my hirsute subjects! The treacherous Rebels have besieged the northern city of Marin without even telling us in advance! I only found out today because the solid-gold rifle I ordered from a factory in Marin hadn't shipped yet, and I was like, WTF?

The bulk of my Imperial Army is in the southeast where the Rebels are SUPPOSED to be. Thus, my brave subjects on the northern frontier: send what you can and you will be rewarded! Remember, promotions are based on who I like, not on merit!
Wow, did you hear that?
Sure did. Marin got jacked.
I was referring to the bit about promotions. Let's go help out our Imperial neighbors!
The city of Marin is now available to visit on the World Map.
The Rebels have breached the city's defenses and are fighting Imperial troops in the streets!
Holy crap - is that General Ashe's battle flag? This is going to be tougher than I thought.
Their defenses are just too strong!
Mi dispiace, signori! Non credo abbiamo una possibilità.
Odio dirlo, ma Perkins potrebbe avere ragione.
But what if we attacked from underneath, like with drill tanks or something! That's possible, right, Floyd?
Non così veloci ragazzi. Certamente, un'assalto frontale non funzionerà.
No.
Allora ERA un sogno.
Warlord Gantas is powerful, yes, but he is just a man. Like all men, he has weaknesses. It is up to us to discover what they are.
Imperiali, la speranza non è perduta.
Sure, it might take a couple weeks, but one of us, probably me, is sure to come up with a brilliant plan. In the meantime, let's put some pressure on Warlord Gantas, and keep building up the Outpost.
Hai sentito? Non mollare.
Keep the troops in fighting shape by battling other outposts!
Non lasciare che i nostri uomini ci vadano leggero!
Man, it's so open and roomy out here now. I feel kinda weird. Like… exposed.
But, as a leader, I can imagine that some other people are, and for their sake, I'm going to build another Pillbox.
Ehi, Io non ho paura!
The only vulnerability I'm afraid of is emotional.
Also, I'm good at math.
There safe and sound. Everyone else is. *ahem* I continue to be very brave. And handsome.
Thank you! I could hug ya' if I weren't wearin' a suit covered in radioactive mutagens.
Don't act like you care. I know you're just in it for the glory.
Thanks for the support! Help me feed the zombie raptors? Just don't look at them funny.
Arena Challenge participation reward!
Excellent work, all.
do you think we have enough walls? It seems like there are some holes in our  defenses. The raider attacks are becoming too frequent for our manned defenses to keep up.
Um, signore...
I WILL discipline you if necessary. You're already supposed to be in time-out. Now leave us alone so we can decide what to do about you.

I think he might be right. If we're going to withstand a full-on Raider counter offensive, we're going to need a LOT of walls. I mean, a ton. Have you seen Gantas' place? That guy has the right idea when it comes to walls.
Non contestare i nostri metodi, Perkins.
Psst...
It's not like we could ever have too many walls.
we'll need some Dragon's Teeth. Those things can wreck someone's day. Enemy vehicles will crash against them, and they're great for funneling troops into choke-points.
Se la nostra base dovesse sopravvivere,
The Raiders don't even have vehicles. But they'll still work on their mammoth riders. Those cannon-toting mammoths will cause some damage if they can breach our perimeter.
So cosa stai pensando.
stinky, gross mammoths into the base, I'm not going to let you hear the end of it. Or smell the end of it. We'll reek like a wet kennel for weeks.
Se lasci anche uno solo di quei
Even though they look like candy, I recommend against making our Dragon's Teeth out of chocolate. The Emperor had me try that on a prior contract in the South.
Okay... they're ugly, but they do seem to be working.
We can't afford to leave holes in our defense while the Raider forces are so strong.
we'll need some Dragon's Teeth. Those things can wreck someone's day. Enemy vehicles will crash against them, and they're great for funneling troops into choke-points.

stinky, gross mammoths into the base, I'm not going to let you hear the end of it. Or smell the end of it. We'll reek like a wet kennel for weeks.

We shouldn't make our Dragon's Teeth out of chocolate, no matter how delicious that would be.
Okay... they're ugly, but they seem to be working.

Ramsey VS I Predoni
Ramsey VS I Predoni - Round 2
Permission to burn down every last watchtower, SIR!
Signore!
Granted! Have fun!
It's like my birthday!
I just hate their towers, you know?
Yeah! Every! Last! Tower!
There's a Raider outside the Outpost!
Signori!
There's always Raiders outside the outpost.
Allora?
I WILL SET MY FISTS ON FIRE AND PUNCH FIRE INTO YOU!
Oh, it's that guy.
Be ready for some serious bruisers, but don't expect brains.
One down.
It looks like Tronk's men are withdrawing, sir!
Man, he barely set anything on fire. Faker.
I Predoni di Tronk
He has a packet of sealed orders for us. At least, I think they're sealed. I can't figure out how to open them, and he won't talk to me.
Signore, un... imperiale è appena arrivato.
This is probably another request for some obscenely large amount of stone... Wait a minute, Rebels? Out here?
Rebels have sent a scouting party north, and under no circumstances can they find out that we're here. Or that anyone would ever want to be out here.
Take our new friend, and find the rebels. That's what the orders say.
Li prendo io quelli.
Questa è una cosa davvero..seria.
This guy looks like he means business. Murder business.
That guy creeped me out. Why didn't he talk?
I don't even want to know the details. I'm sure they were gory.
I found out what I want to be when I grow up! He was so awesome! I wish he didn't disappear without a trace as soon as the mission was complete.
We could train some people to do that kind of thing... but they'd have to be cold blooded, sleep-standing-up-with-their-eyes-open types. Not Perkins.
Imperials, I have watched you for days. I know your weaknesses well. It is only due to the customs of my people that I announce myself before waging the campaign that will be your downfall.
Oh man! You are super creepy!
I'm not creepy! I'm stealthy and mysterious!
Whatever you say, weirdo.
I wish Morgan wouldn't antagonize these guys.
He actually is kinda creepy though.
Jeez, Morgan, that guy was just doing recon. You didn't need to be so mean to him.
It was mind games, Ramsey! War is like 80% mental!
I Predoni di Sarin
Morgan told us to stay behind but it's opposite day!
Abbiamo portato aiuto!
Looks like you're in a bit of a tight spot over here. Cassidy and I thought we'd lend a hand, seeing as we're neighbors and all.
Beh, salve, imperiali.
It's a shame we keep meetin' when one of us is gettin' shot at. But I can't forget what you did for me and my orchard back at Recoil Ridge.
È bello rivederti ancora, Ramsey.
Nothing like ridin' to the aid of a friend.
Can you stick around for the final assault? We've gotta break through to Gantas' tent to end this once and for all.
Grazie per essere comparsi quando dovevate.
Mr. Purrface, stop unrolling all the streamers.
Meow!
Higher! Higher! I want to offend the heavens themselves!!
Aw, man, I wanted to help...
Ramsey, I love ya, but you're insane.
OK, men: from now on, smoking is a court martial offense!
I don't suppose anyone wants to see my crater radius estimates?
I feel like we're committing a crime against humanity now...
I need a danger level above "Extremely Hazardous"... "Apocalyptic," perhaps?
Uh, even I'm startin' to get a little nervous about this thing...
Clicca sull'esercito dei Predoni per attaccare.
No, no, no. There's no way it would cook all the way through. Don't you know anything about Science? Fire does not work that way!
Are you kidding? It will char them to the bone - it's a FLAMETHROWER!
Correct. It throws flames. It's not a Flame Roaster.
I know how to settle this... Perkins!
Perkins, reporting for duty sir!
Put this on.
But I haven't completed Flame Trooper training yet.
It's fine - you're just going out to fetch us an over or under-cooked meal. Depending on who's right.
Tap on the encounter with the Wild Boars, and once the fight starts, just tap on the Boars!
Clicca sull'incontro coi Cinghiali Selvatici e, una volta iniziato lo scontro, clicca sui Cinghiali!
I love the smell of Flame Troopers in the morning.
So... it actually tastes perfectly cooked. That makes neither of us right per se, but it does make me more right than you...
Oh, grow up, Morgan. You have no concept of the Scientific method: hypothesis and testing. There is no emotion or ego involved.
...with no more of a fuel taste than the stuff that comes out of Zoey's jury-rigged bakery.
Hey! I finally got all that gear off - is there anything left?
No.
Candidati per il barbecue
Nothing fires me up like administrative efficiency!
Cacciatori vs. Raptor
Uh oh… Morgan's barricaded himself in the ice factory.
I NEED COLD! NOW! Get into that factory at all costs!
No! Go away! My ice! Mine!!
Seriously, guys, go shoot some Rebels or something.
I'll burn the factory down before I let anyone keep all the ice for themselves!
I'm starting to get mildly concerned about the riots I'm causing…
Oi, I'm sendin' in Mamie, the overly affectionate mammoth!
Aagh! I surrender! I surrender! I'll share the ice, I swear!
Una volta che le Tende sono state completate, cliccaci sopra per renderle abitabile.
Fai clic sul pulsante "Costruisci" e poi "Tende" nella sezione "Abitazioni".
Adesso premi sul lavoro "Carciofo" per piantarlo.
Clicca sulla Fattoria e pianta un Carciofo.
Clicca su un Carciofo maturo per raccoglierlo.
I nostri uomini hanno probabilmente qualche risparmio. Clicca sulle loro tende per riscuotere le tasse.
It's been great serving with you so far. High Command sent these as a token of their appreciation.
Perkins, I told you to plant trees over in that area. I know you like working beside me, but this is about efficiency, not comradery.
Oh god, spiderwasps are eating the trees.
I swore I just planted some–
Well, isn't that conveniently horrible. Y'know, I hated this idea in the first place. Let the spiderwasps eat the trees, for all I care.
Morgan, if we don't plant these trees we could all be in dire trouble! Think of your troop...think of the boot factory! Do you want the boot factory to be washed away?
We'll plant the trees. But I am getting rid of these spiderwasps and you better not say a word about "The Environment" or "Humane Practices" or anything!
Fiiiiiine.
I 'eard about a flood that swept through the Raptor Nest and right into Recoil. People were eatin' dinner and -BAM- raptors slammed right in the puddin'.
I mean, the trees are kind of pretty.
We did it! To be honest, I didn't think we'd plant enough trees in time.
A 'Good Job Everybody' would be nice, Floyd!
I've got to go wash the spiderwasp ichor out of my pants. And by me, I mean Perkins.
At least we won't be eaten by swimmin' raptors. Or spiderwasps.
'Good Job' to me…
Once I asked Morgan to help us plant trees that he burned down and he just wouldn't stop laughing…
The sap of certain trees is used as a ritual hallucinogenic.

Well, this is unfortunate. Topsoil erosions from our constant depletion of natural resources have a high chance of causing flash floods the next time it rains. This could cause tremendous damage to our infrastructure in the Outpost.
Terrible because you're telling me, and your voice is all whiny, and it sounds like it's really not my problem. I mean, aren't you the civil engineer?
That sounds… terrible.
Actually, to be precise, it's all of our problems.
In order to plant enough trees in time for the next predicted storm, we'll all have to pitch in to help.
Oh, and I suppose you're gonna say we have to plant a bunch of different trees for "ecological diversity" or some other made up reason.
Yes, that's exactly what I was going to say.
This is what Morgan gets for leaving me in the pillbox with nothing but a chainsaw…
Are you aware that you're breathing trees right now?
If there's anything I hate more than spiderwasps, it's hippies.
I am not a hippy! Am I a hippy?
The same effects could have been achieved with artificial mulch, but trees are prettier!
I thought those were flowers, but it was spiderwasp mandibles…
Our next Outpost should be underground. Flowers and trees will be banned.
Happy trees make somewhat enthusiastic people.
I mean, what kinda fact do we have that removing all trees on the planet would be bad?
I ain't being eaten by no flash flood, swimming raptors.
Chaining yourself to a tree is quite an exhilarating experience.
Remember that old nursery rhyme? Why would you put a baby cradle in a tree? That's horrifying!
I planted a few "trap trees".. don't tell anyone.
At night I sing to the saplings so they'll grow up with high self-esteem and a knowledge of their culture.
I wanna build a tree fort! With machine guns! And sugar cookies! And bombs that look like sugar cookies!
The trees whisper secrets of a fallen empire. Destruction comes from the roots.
I was going to attack, but they all seem to be busy planting trees and I'd feel kinda bad about it.
Waking up to the smell of trees in the morning is a nauseating experience.

Una delle nostre unità è pronta per essere promossa!

I've got a bunch'a designs I've been workin' on. Here, check out this Pillbox design I put together!

Ipoteticamente, se avessi fatto qualche... investimento sbagliato e mi servisse denaro in fretta, cosa mi consiglieresti? "Vendere Perkins" è una buona idea?
Ehi, Floyd...
Beh, l'Impero chiede ai civili che vivono nei suoi avamposti di pagare (ad altri cittadini imperiali) una regolare quota di protezione, in cambio di un miglior livello di sicurezza.
Mi piace! Raccoglierò le tasse dalle case che abbiamo costruito! Così non sarà necessario mettere al corrente il Capitano del mio piccolo errore.
Le case ti mostreranno quando le tasse son pronte per la riscossione.
Ma di che diavolo sta parlando Morgan?
Accidenti, grazie Floyd. Ti sei dato davvero da fare! Ma teniamo questa emergenza monetaria tra di noi, se non ti spiace...
Eh? Emergenza monetaria? Tenere tra di noi cosa?
La cosa con... ah! Giusto. Continua la cosa tra di noi.
Per esempio, potresti voler costruire altre case e fattorie mentre aspettiamo. O, magari, far partire una espansione del territorio, qui sta diventando dannatamente affollato.
Potresti persino affrettare la costruzione dell'Utensileria utilizzando dei Nanopod. Così potremmo iniziare a produrre strumenti fin da subito.
Tu sei il solo responsabile dei tuoi successi e fallimenti. Quanto forti saranno le nostre truppe dipende dalle scelte che farai tu.
In ultima istanza, la decisione è tua.

L'avamposto sta venendo su abbastanza bene, Capitano! Ma potremmo fare anche meglio se migliorassimo qualcuno dei nostri edifici. Se li miglioriamo, i nostri edifici e le nostre fattorie produrrano di piú.
Basta farlo una volta per raddoppiare la sua produzione!
Per esempio, la nostra Cava di Pietra produrrà Pietra ancora più velocemente, se la potenziamo.
Premi sulla Cava di Pietra e Potenzia l'edificio!
Potenziare quando te lo puoi permettere, è sempre una strategia vincente!
Arriveremo alla capacità massima in un attimo!
Molto bene. La produzione di Pietra è aumentata!
Why does Zoey take every suggestion for a call to action?
Well… let's get started.
With these resources I've allocated to training, I'm expecting to see results.
I'm sure you won't be disappointed.
Are you sure? I am very easily disappointed.
Being disappointed is sort of a hobby of mine to keep me from dealing with real issues.
It's been a while since I've trained recruits. I hope I still got it in me.
Don't you just yell at 'em a bunch? Like "hey maggots"  and "worthless scum"?
No, Perkins, most recruits are trained… a little differently than you were.

So, I think maybe we should go.
Seems reasonable.
You'll let us know if any more of those Zombie types show up, right?
Yup.
So, these Zombies... that your fault?
I mean... not me personally? But yeah, basically.
Swell. You think you gonna take care of 'em?
I'm on it.

I've done some additional research, and I think I have a proposal. Based on their movement patterns, movement speed, hunting behavior, and the vector of their attacks, I've started charting likely origin points for the Infected horde.
Which gives us a range of, what, 200 miles?
Closer to 500 miles. However! I cross referenced it with Imperial Medical Research facilities. There's just the one. Blackish Butte. It's a frozen wasteland.
Absolutely.
Finally, there's an end to all these zombies in sight!
Let's do it.

I've done some additional research, and I think I have a proposal. Based on their movement patterns, movement speed, hunting behavior, and the vector of their attacks, I've started charting likely origin points for the Infected horde.
Which gives us a range of, what, 200 miles?
Closer to 500 miles. However! I cross referenced it with Imperial Medical Research facilities. There's just the one. Blackish Butte. It's a frozen wasteland.
Finally, there's an end to all these zombies in sight!
Honestly, I'm gonna miss 'em.
It's like talking to a wall.
Here we are Morgan. Birthplace of the infected.
Are zombies born? I don't think they are.
Honestly, I'm gonna miss 'em.
It's like talking to a wall.
Here we are Morgan. Birthplace of the infected.
Are zombies born? I don't think they are.
So, this is the Zombie motherland.
Indeed. An Imperial cost cutting measure gone very, very wrong.
We can take a bunch of Black Nanopods, and just stash them in the frozen wastes to the north east. Zombies will wander up, and safely freeze to death.
That's... an excellent point.
Or an Imperial super soldier program gone just a little bit wrong.
Ramsey's got a point.
Just one clean win would be nice.
Whew! That looks like the last of them!
While we've severely decreased the threat, we can assume that stragglers will continue to show up for some time.
Remember, while we've cut off the source, we don't know how many wandered into the Frontier and right past our Outpost!
Extremely doubtful.
Well, swell. Folks, keep your eyes peeled. We've got zombies to face yet.
Let's wipe 'em out!
Just one clean win would be nice.
Whew! That looks like the last of them!
While we've severely decreased the threat, we can assume that stragglers will continue to show up for some time.
Remember, while we've cut off the source, we don't know how many wandered into the Frontier and right past our Outpost!
Extremely doubtful.
Well, swell. Folks, keep your eyes peeled. We've got zombies to face yet.
Let's move before they figure out what happened.
Cassidy! I can't believe you—
Shut your damn mouth, Ramsey. Look, no foolin' around, I like you. I like spending time with you.
But if you think I'm ever, EVER, going to risk my neck because you got some damn fool notion that you need to die for the Empire again, you are sorely mistaken. You will rot before I lift a finger.
That's not—
Chiedi scusa, giura che smetterai di fare il pazzo e ce ne andiamo a casa.
Zitta!
I'm sorry. You're right.
Dannazione, ho ragione.
Lieutenant?  There's some Raiders here to see you...
If they're here to duel me for Yenkcha's heart, tell him I'll shoot them after I finish my tea.
Actually, sir, they're not interested in Yenkcha. They want to meet you.
Pardon?!
They say they've heard about the victories earned by the great Skinny Beast, and they want to train under you to become stronger.
Huh... Tell them... they have to prove their worth. Aid our troops in fending off some Silver Wolves.
Never send your own cannon fodder when you can send someone else's.
There's always a catch.
Wow, nicely done. OK, those guys can stay.
They say they're proud to train under you, but if you wish them to serve the Empire in combat, tradition demands a payment of some kind.
Of course it does.
After analyzing traces of poison from a Spiderwasp stinger I extracted from a Bigfoot's paw, I've been able to determine the exact species and their likely whereabouts.
And what does this have to do with me?
I've already explained this. In order to lure the Spiderwasps out of their burrows and capture one for study, I need you to wear this spider suit and stand in the coordinates I've provided.
...didn't you say Spiderwasps took their prey back to their Queen as food after paralyzing them with the most painful sting imaginable?

Make sure when you're in the costume to wave all eight spider appendages to appear as appetizing as possible. I'll be waiting nearby with a tranquilizer dart. I assure you, you'll have at least a forty percent chance of survival.

Couldn't help but overhear y'all. I been workin' on a little side project. Details ain't important, but it involves giant spider robots. If y'all help me make the prototype, you can use it to wrangle a Spiderwasp.
...what else is Zoey doing with her spare time?
Oh well, I'm sure I'll find some use for it.
Looks like the real thing, don't it? It's even remote operated, so you can hide while you get it into position.
And to think I spent all that effort making the spider costume.
When we get to Bigfoot Country, I'll maneuver the giant spider robot into position. Once a Spiderwasp emerges from its burrow, we move in for the capture.

Perkins, if you're targeted for attack, just fall on the ground and remain completely inert. Since you're allergic to bees, I imagine a sting from a Spiderwasp will likely induce cardiac arrest. Don't worry, I'll bring adrenaline shots.
Oh, why would I be worried?
Oh, why would I be worried?
And maybe I'll bring the spider costume in case the robot breaks down...
...maybe I should pretend to be surprised to make Floyd feel better?
Success! Now we simply transport the Spiderwasp back to the Outpost for experimentation and-
-Perkins, don't turn around.
There's more right behind me, aren't there?
I don't want to alarm you, but the spider robot has drawn them from their burrows. We appear to be surrounded.
I think we should release the Spiderwasp and run.
Perkins, that is not how Science works.
I am never doing this again.
Did you happen to bring the giant spider robot back?
I can't feel my arms.
Were you stung? Do you need me to jab this giant adrenaline needle into your heart?
Never mind, you look fine. The important thing is we escaped with the test subject.
Your point is well made, Imperial. Call off the attacks.
Sarin? What the hell are you doing here?
The Outcasts are used to this kind of mockery from our own people, but I will not stand for it from outsiders!
Mockery? Perkins, did I play a prank on Sarin that I don't— Whoa!  Where are those shots coming from?!
Again! I tire of this! I will eliminate this nuisance myself!
Wait, I still have no idea what's going on!
But... if a Deadeye wishes to duel again... I'll be waiting...
Okay, those guys are definitely Imperial, but I have no clue who they are...
Imperial Deadeye snipers. Kinda fixated on being the best. Probably came out here to test themselves against Sarin.
They sought me out? They thought me worthy enough to pursue this long...?  Well. I suppose I will let this go this time.  But mark my words, the next time we meet, I will not be so generous!
Seriously, Sarin, you need to do something about your self esteem. You're better than this.
L'imboscata di Sarin
Well, I'm outta here, LT!
What? You can't quit now! I'm still waiting on that spring-loaded coffee maker you promised me for my birthday! I was going to use it to scald-slash-prank Ramsey.
Quittin'? I ain't quittin'! I'm enterin' the Trebuchet Contest at Recoil Ridge, remember?
You made me submit about twenty forms about it last month.
I put 'em in your inbox.
Inbox? I don't have a... Wait, did you seriously not realize this was a trash can?
Well, if you're leaving the Outpost, I'm coming with you. You're a key part of this organization, and I won't tolerate any risk to our investment.
Also, I really want to find out what a "trebuchet" is.
Are you sure you want to? There hasn't been any cleanup yet. Bernmoth is kind of...
I've buried sons and daughters, grandchildren and great grandchildren. Somehow, I've never had to bury someone taken by violence.
I've been a very lucky woman. I...
I'm ready to go, Lieutenant.
La mia famiglia è spuntata nei dintorni delle miniere.
Let's get this done.
These people need us.
He liked you. Thought you were decent folks.
I liked him. Judge Pierce was a good... a great man.
Those Silver Wolves are going to try to do this again and again.
Non è finita, lo sai.
I know. I won't let them, though. We'll stop them.
Well, I certainly hope so. You've got a long way to go, and it's gonna get a lot worse before it gets better.
So, I'm really sorry, but it looks like they've noticed what we're up to.
Looks like it. You feel ready for a fight?
Also, I'm really sorry. Really.
Maledettamente giusto.
I didn't come this far to get caught.
I'm a very lucky man.
Again, I'm sor—
Ramsey, you're sorry, great. We'll talk about it later. We've kinda got a lot going on right now.
Right. Good point.
OK, boys, looks like we're in a bad way up ahead. Any ideas?
We could have one of the Demolitionists steal that Flame Tank. That oughta give us an edge.
Sapevo che c'era una ragione per cui mi piacevi.
There's a reason she likes me!
It's okay. A lot of people don't get the poison.
Hot damn, we might actually make it out of here.
Yeah, no one will have to take the poison!
Man, what is it with you Imperials and poison?
All right, boys... and also Cassidy! We're almost out of here. Let's break through that defensive line and get a move on.
What do we do next?
We'll need to ditch the tank - too easy to track. Then we'll just work our way back north on foot until we find transport.
Sounds like a hoot.
Can't believe I almost blew it with her.
This is one hell of a first date.
All right, you folks head northeast into the hills.  I'll take this tank due west, throw them off the trail, and catch up with you.
If you think I'm letting you out of my sight, you're nuts.
Works for me. Demolitionists, you head northeast. Cassidy and I will find you. Don't wait up.

These old, broken down military vehicles are an eyesore. They're piling up on the roads, behind the factory, behind MY HOUSE. If we don't do something about them, how am I supposed to enjoy the view from my terrace with my morning coffee?
My hypothetical terrace, I mean, that I'm going to build from scraps of Perkin's bunk.
We could set up a recycling campaign to properly dispose of retired military vehicles.
Or we could crush 'em with the monster trucks I built? I call it "TANK CRUSHER."
I'm going with Zoey's idea just because it sounds like, waaay cooler?
I mean seriously, Floyd, a recycling program? Do you think I'd be caught dead driving a USED tank?
I may be crying. But from happiness. Happy tears.
Zoey, I've never been prouder of you. This must be what it feels like to be in heaven.
Your idea of heaven is watching vehicles being crushed under giant tires?
Perkins, don't you have some type of.. demeaning work to do?
I'll get right on that… sir.
Zoey, I'm going to need like, a thousand more of these.
I don't know if that's such a good idea.
We should probably automate the process of writing thank you cards an' build an enormous distribution machine to shower the whole Outpost as a sign of our appreciation!
Why'd L.T have to ban the card cannon? I could'a sent out party invites.
Lieutenant, after twelve weeks of careful and completely unsupervised research in the lab, I've constructed a compound that I've successfully used to tame and train a single type of Spiderwasp.
Floyd, I never thought I'd be saying these words to you, but this is great news!
There is, however, a minor side-effect...
Does this "minor" side-effect have anything to do with the screaming horde approaching us right now?
Well, I have found the compound can induce homicidal rage in a small percentage of hominids...
Well, isn't that fantastic? Might as well put those Spiderwasps you tamed to work...
At this point, I would be fine with getting rid of all of them with a giant can of bug spray.
Floyd, you could consider confiding in an actual expert next time you interfere with the environment...
These Spiderwasp Strikers are amazing! Let's produce more of that compound immediately!
It seems a shame to force them into battle after finally managing to subdue them...
Floyd, that's crazy talk.
And as we all know, playing god with deadly, unpredictable forces never had consequences for anyone.
Guardie
Lupi d'Argento
Lupi d'Argento
Lupi d'Argento
Oh. I knew that.  Okay, sure, go ahead.
Okay, men, you know the plan. We cause as much damage to Tronk's forces as we can. That'll let Henderson's men sneak in and free the slaves.
Phew! Hope we're on time, Lieutenant!
Sheriff? What're you doing here?
We heard about what you were doing. We want to help! We can't let this Raider feller keep taking slaves!
Well, if that's what you want... Any objections, Henderson?
All men are brothers in the war on oppression! Come on, let's go!
I'LL FEED YOUR ENTRAILS TO MY GOATS!
It's more fun, anyway!
There's the signal! They've freed the slaves!
Woo-wee! That was some fightin'! Glad that y'all are on our side!
Yeah... I have to say, Sheriff, I'm surprised you cared enough to come up here and risk your lives when you didn't have to.
Heck, I'm as concerned about fairness and justice as the next man! Besides, the Lieutenant there's done so much for us, we're happy to return the favor.
I... see.
Sorry, but this isn't the place or time for heartwarming moments of mutual understanding. Tronk's still out there, so this is the time for mindless violence and mayhem.
Perimetro di Tronk
Rivolta degli Schiavi
What, you're too scared to face me?

Let me put this a different way. You're about to die in a hail of gunfire from Imperial troops. As happy as that makes me, I can't shake the feeling that you're just a cog in a larger machine, and not even an essential one.
I'm here to watch you fall, but I'm not going to pretend it matters when you hit the ground.
He got shot like nine times!
The survivors are surrendering, sir! We did it!
No, we didn't. Why did they abandon their defenses? And where are Bronson and Stephenson?
Too slow again, Morgan.
This is... Tie him up, and Ramsey, if he does anything but bleed or breathe, shoot him.
E' sopravvissuto? seriamente?
Why does Ramsey always get to do the fun stuff...
I've never seen these types of infected before. Perhaps someone has been experimenting on them?
Floyd, remember the talk we had about how things have consequences?
I was young and stupid! My days of reckless biological experimentation are over!
I've already stopped listening. Ramsey, let's head to Recoil Ridge to see if we can find any more about where these things are coming from.
Zoey, you're in charge while we're gone.
Damn zombies. My folks got crops to harvest…
When did these things start showing up?
Day before yesterday. Most of us been holed up nailing boards to the windows, and from the looks of it we ain't going outside anytime soon. You better fix this quick.
I should have stayed home. I've got more important things to do than kill zombies. Like shaping my eyebrows.
Sigh.
More enemies? I didn't think we could find any more.
Zoey! Zoey! We found these black glowing things buried outside!
Someone buried black nanopods in the outpost?
I really should stop forgetting to lock the raptor pen at night...
It ain't any of us that hid those things. Looks like we got some more enemies.
I'm bleeding kinda bad...
Ah! It bit me!
Perkins, I've told you already, these creatures can't actually transfer their infection to you via bodily fluids. You're perfectly safe.
I think I need to go to the hospital.
You're fine. Now help me carry this thing. Pick up its legs. Not like that. Put your back into it!
I mean… it's a LITTLE trappy.
The guy with the chainsaw says he's a Zombie Hunter, and that we've clearly got enemies.
Enemies, are these new enemies, or existing enemies using a new—
You know what, nevermind. I don't even care. They can get in line with the rest of the people who want to kill me.
He says he'll take us to the source.
This feels kinda like a trap to me. Does this feel "trappy" to you?
AHHHHHHHHHH
AHHHHHHHHHH
So… did it work? Did you cure the zombie?
AHHHHHHHHHH
Gosh! That fella's huge!
Taro, I dare you to put your head in its mouth!
Yay! A new pet!
Kids, this ain't a pet. It's a vicious killin' machine.
….just wear gloves when you play with it.
Nnghhhhh…
So we're just gonna' pretend to be zombies until L.T and Ramsey get back?
Ghhhhh
Excellent work Perkins! You've really captured the mindlessness and confusion of the infected.
I think he's just going into shock from all his bite wounds.
I just hope L.T gets back here soon...
He said to stop harshing his vibes.
There's the last of them!
Probably not. I mean, this was a big nest for sure, but I'd bet we've still got hundreds, if not thousands wandering… could be more nests out there too.
Ramsey, what did I say about accurately predicting future struggles while I'm celebrating?
He likes me. He really, really likes me…
Lieutenant, cease fire immediately! There's been a mistake!
We ain't dead!
Why are you all dressed up like that?
Well, it's a rather complicated matter. I'll have to draft up a detailed analysis that could take me a few days of intensive study...
Floyd got scared so we dressed up like zombies to hide.
….What did you never get to tell me, Lieutenant?
Wait, Perkins isn't a zombie?
Perkins, take off that ridiculous costume! And go clean up around here! Here's your toothbrush.
Dr. Harris, your little pet project is running 'amuck outside.
…which one?
Some ancient tech. I think you called 'er Experiment X17?
What did you do to her?
Esperimento X17?!
Nothin', except almost getting blasted a few years backwards from those lasers. This ain't on me.
Cosa le ho fatto?!
Hmm. I always entertained the possibility of Experiment X17 escaping my control. And ordinary weapons won't harm this ancient construct.
Well, L.T and the rest of us, we're over our heads. Let's go to i17. Maybe they can help us.
i17? Might as well ask a bunch of grad students for help...
I believe I was the one who wrote up those blueprints...
Dr. Harris, I didn't think I'd see you again.
I was hoping I wouldn't.
Trust me, if I wanted someone to alphabetize my microbial slides you'd be the first one I'd call.
It's about as far as your scientific prowess will take you.
C'mon, can't you guys stop fussin' at each other? We've got a killer ancient tech on the loose and none of the weapons we got can even scratch the thing.
In our archives we have blueprints for a weapon that could potentially defeat such a creature. Unfortunately, we don't have the materials available.
How hard can it be? What do you need?
Well, first off, we'll need a jet engine...
The ethanol injectors are goin' in fine, Floyd! We'll be done in no time!
That's wonderful Zoey! It's so rare that we have the opportunity to act in a purely benevolent manner, helping to undo some of the damage that's been done to our natural world.
Sir! Spiderwasps! In the mine! They're attacking the workers!
Sorry Floyd, looks like we gotta do some damage to the natural world.
Still, it's nice knowing our intentions were pure.
I try to maintain a positive outlook. I REALLY do.
Alright, what's done is done. Let's finish getting the ethanol injectors installed, and see if we can't minimize any further damage.
Will do, Floyd! But I feel like I should warn ya, the fight mighta caused some damage ta the local fault lines. I wouldn't be surprised if there were earthquakes or somethin'.
Nor would I, Zoey. Nor would I.
Hey Floyd, remember when I said we mighta caused a coupla earthquakes?
Are we about to be crushed to death?
I mean, it's possible an' all, but it looks like a quake opened up a Spiderwasp nest ta the south, so there's a real good chance they'll run all over every village nearby… and the Outpost.
Well, at least we're not getting crushed.
And if the ethanol doesn't work, I'm just going to scream for a few hours and then move on.
Well, that was a heck of a disaster. An' we still haven't figured out a way to keep the Spiderwasps from goin' wild. Sorry, Floyd.
Zoey, we're not dead, we're not paralyzed by a poison, AND we managed to get the ethanol injectors installed and working.
Sure, we uncovered a massive Spiderwasp nest and riled up the hordes of giant insects within, but I'm going to go ahead and call this one a win.

Let's break it down. Someone is feeding Intel to the Rebels. We've found accurate intel, but it tends to be vague. Then we've found extremely specific stuff, some of which is entirely accurate, and some of which has been fudged to make us look like monsters.

Ashe has told us whoever fudged the intel did it on purpose. But the Rebels BELIEVED them, even though it was pretty far fetched. So it stands to be reasoned that this person is someone who is trusted both by us AND the rebellion.
Either the Rebels have an existing relationship with this person, or the person is so well placed, that they couldn't help but take them seriously. Who could that possibly be?
Installation 17? Maybe someone out there wanted to cut a deal?
I don't know I guess so, hey Mister Perkins, how come you're asking us instead of going there and finding out?
Hard to find an audience for long-winded monologues these days.
Whew, it was some work getting those files back to the Outpost, but I'm ready to dive in!
This is going to take all night... guess we better get started.
I'll need some kale juice to get me through this.
Kale... juice? Why not just some coffee?
Perkins, I am ashamed of you. Coffee is a stimulant. Coffee is a DRUG.
So you're not okay with coffee, but you're okay with putting experimental drugs IN Lieutenant Morgan's coffee? Okay. That makes sense.

What does coffee contain? Adenosine! What is adenosine? It's an inhibitory neurotransmitter that plays a role in energy regulation. Coffee blocks the adenosine receptors, dysregulating our natural energy cues! It's highly addictive!
Caffeine can also cause ulcers, miscarriage, and death!
Okay, okay! We'll make the kale juice. THEN can we get to the archives?
I haven't had this much fun since my days of middle school experimentation with dry ice.
Sometimes, I really, really hate knowing things.
I can barely keep my eyes open, and we haven't found anything useful.
Installation 17 was incredibly thorough. Before the collapse of the Empire, there would have been no chance of a leak.
Even now, I'd say it's highly unlikely any of their employees would have had the breathing room to become an informant.
Well, that's a disturbing revelation.
I think we've come to the same conclusion, and I have to agree. It couldn't have been an employee of Installation 17. At least, one outside a leadership role.
So, IF the leak came from Installation 17, that leaves either Archibald himself, or Aurora. And seeing as how we work with one, and saved the other, it's an unlikely, but terrifying, possibility.
Sir, we're being attacked by Rebels.
Ramsey, I heard you say something but your lips weren't moving. Are you practicing ventriloquism now? And can you teach me? How did you do the "buh" sound in "being?"
No, I say that phrase so often I recorded it. See?
Ah, then never mind about the ventriloquism. That was just to test you.
Smooth cover, Morgan...
I did it! And my hands are only a little burned!
Captain, I'm not usually one for celebrations and parties, unless whiskey is involved.
In fact, I banned parties after the last one caused wide scale riots, but we've made it to level 60.
L.T, 60 is great but 65 is even better! And if we can get there, I've got somethin' special planned!
Well we better hurry and level up while we can. As we get stronger, so does everyone else who's trying to kill us...
Getting killed would be really inconvenient right now.
I guess the little trooper guy is kind of cute.
Well, we did it, Captain. We made it to level 65.
We've survived raiders, silver wolves, rebels, mammoths, ninjas, and creatures who were driven to homicidal rage by poisonous gases.
...Just so you know, I haven't forgiven you for that last one, Floyd.
Will this commemorative statue that Zoey and I have been working on alleviate your ill will toward me?
It depends, is it a statue of me?
No. It's a memorial to represent our progress as an Outpost and our commitment to battle head on whatever struggles we may face in the future.
Then forget it.
I think it looks pretty cool! Look at the size of that tank!
Quale impudenza!
Almeno Trotbeck non è piena di hippy fuori di testa.
Questa è la prima cosa che ci hanno insegnato all'Addestramento di Base.
Detesto la violenza.
Non dovresti fidarti SOPRATTUTTO di un hippy con una fattoria.
Però hai appena distrutto la nostra fabbrica di armi...
Perkins contro il Verme
Il Parassita di Perkins?
They must've gotten riled up by the signals secreted by the sandworm in times of distress.
I don't care how they got here! I just want them gone.
Maybe I can get some samples while I'm here?
I wish Perkins was here so I could kill him.
Oh no, more sandworms!
Assassins! They murdered him!
No, no! It's been a mistake! We didn't kill him! He just fell over dead while we were about to sign the peace treaty! Did anyone know if he had a heart condition?
A heart condition that looks a lot like an arrow in the back? Oh god. He WAS assassinated.
Just when everything was going so well… I should've known.
Troops, prepare yourselves! Get to your battle stations!
Assassinating someone at peace talks is seven years bad luck...
I don't have much left to give...
Someone really has it out for us, you know?
Honestly, can you blame them?

I've dedicated my whole life to fighting this rebellion. I've had to trudge through swamps and harsh deserts and watch my best friends die of curable infections and amputations. I've starved for weeks and had to drink things you don't even want to know exist.

I've lost my faith, my hope, and damn near everything else. And the one chance, the ONE chance we have to end this war, and maybe start a new life where we can forget all this, it gets an arrow through the back!
... Yes? I mean, yes I can! And frankly, I'm sick of it!
WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED?!
Sir, you can stop yelling. We can hear you.
Oh, right.
The bomb Perkins set off caused an avalanche.
And a bunch of deadly animals are stampeding straight toward us.
Thanks, Perkins. You've ruined all our lives. How do you feel about that?
Don't have to tell me three times!
I'd like to personally thank you in your assistance for helping with these stampeding animals.
Lieutenant Morgan!
You're… welcome?
As you can see, my troops are very busy in the midst of this unexpected and perfectly natural disaster. So busy, we wouldn't have time to pursue you if you so chose to abscond from a fight.
Not… really sure I'm following you.
Lieutenant, these animals could injure nearby townsfolk, and that is my top priority. I am simply too busy to engage you right now. And I think you should leave.
As in immediately.
Lieutenant, permission to take a short leave this afternoon.
Ramsey, we've talked about this, you're allowed to relax in the evening unless you're specifically on duty. You don't have to request leave.
Right, sorry, Morgan. I'm just feeling really run down and out of sorts. Wanted to make sure you could spare me.
Again, if you're not on the duty roster, I'm not sparing you, I already have things covered. Go relax. Take it easy.
Will do, Lieutenant. I'll probably just do a quick workout, get the blood pumping.
Just need some exercise equipment.
What's insane about a commitment to physical fitness?
I thought you were doing a quick workout. What's with the ball and chain?
Seriously?
I'm getting slow, Morgan! I can't let a little thing like a seventy pound weight around one ankle keep me from nailing a four minute mile!
Okay, right, see, I just forget sometimes that you are an insane person. So thank you for reminding me about that.
It's not enough, Zoey! I'm pushing myself as hard as I can, but I still can't shake this feeling. I've gotta work through it!

I've been tinkerin' with an idea: directly stimulatin' muscle groups with an electrical charge to force contractions. I kinda figured it would be for torture or somethin', but you could probably use it to work out longer.
I'm in! What do you need?
I can rig somethin' up with a couple of Electro-Geared Cutters from the Machine Shop.
If this doesn't kill him, he's gonna be in GREAT shape.
None of them made it back, though...
These are fantastic! I ran until I passed out, and then I just kept running! I woke up alone in the middle of the wasteland!
Zoey!
That's what kept happening to the test subjects too!
Your hunch mighta been right. That rover broke down just before reachin' the mountains. I ain't been able to get a signal.
Don't tell me you're thinking of going out there without assistance?
Findin' Dr. Harris might be the best chance we got at winnin' this war. I ain't gonna give up on that.
Well, we can't go with you, but I'll pull some strings and get you something to take along.
Why do mad inventors always gotta be the reclusive types?
Here's the rover. The poor thing got completely fried.
I think I just found out why…
I get a bit weirded out just talkin' to myself out here.
These traps are givin' me all sortsa ideas for the Outpost.
There's a cave been lived in, but Dr. Harris musta cleared out years ago.
There has to be something left behind. Some sort of clue. Harris ain't getting away that easy.
You've either gone insane and joined the Silverwolves, or you just really don't like me.
Lupi d'Argento?
I wouldn't rule out either of those options yet.
They need a place to work. We thought they might be useful to you.
Suppose we could use some help in the mines. But I'd need some help in training them. You folks wouldn't mind?
I think I'm holding this pick-axe upside down?
We'll deal with the future when it comes.
Thanks for your help. They seem eager to work now, though I worry about what could happen in the future.
Mi sento un po' strano a mandare la gente ai lavori forzati...
Ramsey, have you seen Perkins? He never got those blood stains out of my church pants.
Yeah, about that…
He's undercover in a Rebel camp in the Heartland, attempting to extract details on the mole who is compromising the security of the outpost or die trying.
Oh man, that little bastard better not die trying! I SPECIFICALLY told him not to die trying!
Morgan expresses his concern for Perkins… not… well.
Do you have ANY IDEA how SCARED I was?
Perkins! I have a really vivid memory where I told you not to do the thing you just did. I don't… I don't even…
I mean, you know how mad I get at you normally, can you imagine how angry I am with you when you're actively insubordinate?
I have details on a half dozen leaks, including two in Recoil Ridge, and a good twenty more solid leads.
Fine, you can come home, but you are in all KINDS of trouble, Mister.
Ah, Lieutenant Morgan! It's good to see you.
Woah! When did you get here?
Me? A little while ago. I understand that you've been distracted.
Man, you ain't kiddin'. What's up? Do you need like… some ropes? For… tying things?
Nothing so specific. Perhaps some hardtack for the road?
I mean, that's… most of what we make at the bakery. We can probably see to that.
Every knot was once straight rope.
Huh, I guess adventurous archeologists have surprisingly dynamic schedules.
Percival! Sorry, things have been nuts around here. So, what do you say, time to check out the textbooks? If they're for kids, we might even be able to understand them!
Alas, Perkins dear lad, now is not the time. I must make my way. Other opportunities await. But chin up, I'll return, and perhaps then we can make our attempt.
Oh, yeah, sure. I'll just… I'll see you then.
Sir, remember the time we paid off informants in Recoil Ridge?
Yes, and I will never let you forget the money we blew on that or the time spent building those persuaders.
I know I said I'd punish you, but frankly, I've been kind of busy, and it's just so embarrassing... I'd rather not make a huge deal out of it, you know?
Wow… okay...
Sir, I just saw Perkins looking defeated, wandering out of the Outpost? Do you know anything about that?
I heard nothing you said, Ramsey, because there is still blood on my church pants and I have something important to do in twenty minutes!
Wait, has anyone seen Perkins?
I am fairly certain there was not a Rebel camp here a few months ago.
This is probably not a good idea...
On it, LT!
So Floyd, is this mine empty, like that other one?
Well, given that it's not 500 years old and built by an unknown culture that seems to have developed well before any known, no, it's not like that other mine.
As for being empty, I don't believe so, but it's dangerous to spend much time deep in the mine without protection.
Wait, Floyd, are you asking me if you can borrow -
Hazmat suits Morgan. I'm going to make Hazmat suits.
Ok, cool, because like, the other things… they're not easy to get out here. And I need mine. All of them.
What in the world is he talking about?
That would be my supposition as well.
We've made a reasonably thorough examination of the mine. There is, to say the least, plenty of Uranium, given that we don't know what it does or how to use it. The mine looks nearly brand new.
Sweet! We're rich! Are we rich?
Rich in radioactive minerals, certainly. I'm not really sure how that translates to material wealth.
Huh. I'm gonna guess "badly."
So we don't know what Uranium is, or how to use it, but I feel like, you know, we've come this far… can we dig it up?
I've been working on that actually. We have most of the tools we need, and can fabricate what we don't have. We'll also need lead containers, as radiation shielding.
Man, this Uranium stuff better do something cool.
Wait, isn't lead toxic?
Does it have to do with Pyramids?
Well, we have a bunch of lead containers full of a radioactive material we don't understand.
On the plus side, we've completed the mission we were sent here for, by a government that no longer exists to support an army that has been defeated in a war we've already lost.
Morgan, are you familiar with the concept of a Pyrrhic Victory?
Morgan! I have some news about the mine!
What's with the smile? Did the Uranium turn useful or are we just finding gold or something now?
Hmm? Oh! No! This is bad news. Sorry, I'm in a good mood about unrelated events.  Anyway, the mine is under attack. Spiderwasps.
Man, you can't build a guy up like that.
My tomatoes are coming in!
I guess I give up sleeping for the rest of my life.
Well Morgan, we've done it! The mine is safe again!
Is there secret bad news you're not telling me?
Not… that I know of? It's always possible there's secret bad news none of us know. You might be secretly sick or something. There could be a meteor headed here to destroy us all.
Well… that's deeply upsetting.

77 years ago: Henrik the Great took the throne...
During his long reign, he conquered most of the continent of Ateria.
His son, Emperor Tragan, industrialized the land. But a storm was brewing.
Tragan's son, Henrik II, became Emperor amidst a wave of rebellion.
Now with General Ashe in command, the Rebels are making their last stand...

Quando si entra in un Appartamento, si viene accolti da una panoplia di aromi - un'epica avventura olfattiva che va dall'acre odore delle uova marce al potente afrore di stivali usati da poco. Una struttura Top-Secret per l'addestramento dei guerrieri più letali che l'impero produce. Questo edificio sblocca rari e potenti soldati esclusivi. Tu non sei un vero comandante, fino a quando non hai schierato un Commando mortale sul campo di battaglia.
Centro Servizi Segreti
Concediti la Fabbrica d'Armi. Sarai in grado di addestrare truppe con potenti nuove armi come il Mitragliere Pesante e la Squadra Bazooka. Vai avanti, te lo sei meritato.
Fabbrica d'Armi
Quale modo migliore per mettere in ginocchio la frontiera che affermare il proprio dominio sulla stessa natura? È tempo che queste bestie imparino a servire l'Impero!
Addestratore di Animali

Potenzia la Caserma per sbloccare nuove truppe e addestrarle più velocemente con meno Oro e meno Risorse!

Sottolineando "Battle" (battaglia) in Battle Nations, la Caserma serve ad addestrare le truppe.
Caserma
Stanco di Bigfoot deboli e rammolliti? Dagli a noi, e li trasformeremo in sanguinarie macchine per uccidere che il più delle volte faranno quello che gli dici!
Poligono dei Bigfoot

Upgrade the Dry Dock to unlock new boats and build them faster for less Gold and fewer Resources!

Far superior to all those other docks that aren't dry, you can construct ships here without all that pesky water getting in the way.
Dry Dock
Using the latest techniques in fish whispering, the technicians at this facility have finally learned how to train giant murderous fish to fight for you instead of against you!
Fish Hatchery

Birra gratis!

Il consumo di birra costituisce un contratto vincolante fra il bevitore (d'ora in avanti, il fesso) e l'esercito Imperiale.
Centro di Reclutamento
Tutta la fantastica tecnologia che sta dietro al laser si riduce in gran parte alla smerigliatura di precisione delle lenti. Molti di quelli che lavorano qui una volta fabbricavano occhiali.
Laboratorio Ottico

Half of this factory's time is spent making plasma weapons. The other half is spent training the troopers and tank drivers to make sure they don't end up accidentally wiping out all life within a two mile radius.
Plasma Weapons Factory

Usa le Stelle per addestrare truppe che non puoi ottenere da nessun'altra parte. I soldati addestrati nella Accademia Prestigiosa hanno armi più forti, abilità migliori, denti più bianchi e un alito migliore.
Accademia Prestigiosa

I Predoni del Santuario, capeggiati da Taos l'Anziano, non possono dirsi amichevoli. Ma Il Capoguerra Gantas li ha spesso maltrattati per cui, se sarai in grado di portar loro abbastaza Teschi ottenuti da scontri con Predoni, potresti anche convincerne qualcuno a combattere per te.
Poligono dei Predoni
Ai Lupi d'Argento piace l'Oro. Tu hai dell'Oro. Forse si potrebbe combinare qualcosa?
Base dei Mercenari

Potenzia la Fabbrica dei Veicoli per sbloccare nuovi veicoli e costruirli più velocemente e con meno Oro e meno Risorse!

Porta le tue esperienze di battaglia al livello successivo con la Fabbrica dei Veicoli. Costruisci potenti veicoli quali il Camion Lanciarazzi, i Cavalca Dune e soprattutto - CARRI ARMATI! Assicurati solamente di avere abbastanza Petrolio!
Fabbrica dei Veicoli

Potenzia per diminuire i costi in Oro, i costi in Risorse e i tempo di riparazione, e aumenta la capacità della coda!

Come un ospedale, ma per le macchine, e con strumenti e competenze specializzati, e l'intera attrezzatura completamente diversa.
Centro Riparazioni

Potenzia per diminuire i costi in Oro, i costi in Risorse e i tempo di guarigione, e aumenta la capacità della coda!

Rimpiazzando la maggior parte degli umani con dei robot, facendo ribellare i robot, costringendo gli umani a combattere i robot fino alla morte, e restituendo ai sopravvissuti il proprio lavoro, siamo riusciti a migliorare sensibilmente la produttività tagliando simultaneamente i costi. In un modo o nell'altro.
Centro Riparazioni Avanzato
Il denaro è potenza, ma sai cos'altro è potenza? La Potenza. Questo impianto ti permetterà di aumentare la fornitura di energia, rendendo possibile la costruzione di edifici migliori.
Centrale a Legno

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Cemento!

I recenti progressi nella frantumazione delle pietre ci permettono di costruire l'Impianto di Betonaggio Avanzato, con il doppio della produzione di Cemento rispetto all'impianto normale. Risparmia tempo e lavoratori passando agli Impianti di Betonaggio Avanzato!
Impianto di Betonaggio Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Cemento!

Grazie ai miracoli della tecnologia, questo stabilimento ti consente di trasformare la Pietra in Cemento!
Impianto di Betonaggio

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Legname!

Aumentando il numero di lame da sega pericolosamente esposte nel posto di lavoro, puoi terrorizzare i tuoi lavoratori portandoli a livelli di produzione ed efficienza più alti. Con le Segherie Avanzate puoi ottenere il doppio del Legname al giorno dallo stesso numero di lavoratori!
Segheria Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Legname!

Hai un mucchio di Legno che vorresti fosse invece Legname? La Segheria è proprio l'edificio che fa per te!
Segheria
The secret to refining even more plasma in a shorter time is quite simple: bend the laws of physics to the breaking point and put the physical integrity of the universe into serious peril.
Advanced Plasma Refinery

Normally, adding oil to chemicals just gives you oily chemicals, but a top secret process fuses the two into valuable plasma. Just be sure to read the 500 page safety manual before getting within fifty feet of a single drop.
Plasma Refinery

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Acciaio!

Impegando le più moderne tecniche di raffinazione, l'Acciaieria Av. produce Acciaio più in fretta e consuma meno Ferro nel processo. Sostituisci due Acciaierie standard con una Avanzata e risparmia un bel po' di lavoratori!
Acciaieria Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Acciaio!

L'Acciaieria produrrà l'Acciaio per te in cambio di Ferro E Carbone. Nessun altro impianto è così esoso. L'Acciaieria richiede moltissima manutenzione. 
E segretamente, nel suo cuore è contenta così.
Acciaieria

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Carbone!

Con la Miniera di Carbone puoi contrarre l'antracosi e morire in un'età innaturalmente giovane! In più, il Carbone è un ingrediente di vitale importanza se vuoi produrre dell'Acciaio.
Miniera di Carbone

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Carbone!

Le Miniere di Carbone Avanzate della seconda generazione rimuovono tutte le misure e procedure di sicurezza, ciò che gli permette di raddoppiare la loro produzione. Evidentemente, chiunque abbia detto "Prima la Sicurezza" non aveva capito quant'è prezioso il Carbone.
Miniera di Carbone Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Ferro!

Il Ferro è impiegato per costruire gran parte delle prime Truppe e dei primi Veicoli. Costruisci questa Miniera di Ferro su un Deposito di Ferro e guarda i lingotti arrivare!
Miniera di Ferro

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Ferro!

Le ricerche dell'Impero in fatto di trivelle più grandi e taglienti hanno finalmente dato il loro frutto. Trasporta in aria la tua nuova trivella gigante EXTRA appuntita direttamente dai laboratori di ricerca e raddoppia la tua produzione di Ferro!
Miniera di Ferro Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Petrolio!

Il Petrolio serve a costruire tutti i veicoli, tranne i più leggeri. Continuano a promettere carri armati ad energia solare, ma per qualche motivo quella tecnologia sembra sempre essere lontana di 10 anni.
Pozzo Petrolifero

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Petrolio!

I Pozzi Petroliferi Avanzati sono dotati di un motore principale migliorato, di riduttore di marcia, valvola a scorrimento e una barra lucida e più spessa per tutte le tue esigenze in fatto di pompaggio di Petrolio.
Pozzo Petrolifero Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Pietra!

Posiziona una Cava di Pietra su un affioramento di Pietra per avere... Pietra.
Cava di Pietra

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Pietra!

L'Impero ti ha dato il permesso di portare attrezzatura avanzate per velocizzare l'estrazione di Pietra! Cogli i vantaggi di questa preziosa opportunità ed prendi la tua Cava di Pietra Av. oggi!
Cava di Pietra Av.

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Legno!

In questa desolata landa di terra è sparito tutto tranne una manciata di alberi. Quindi perché non finisci l'opera costruendo una Segheria e tagli quello che rimane?
Campo di Disboscamento

Potenzia per aumentare la produzione di Legno!

Alberi rognosi smussano le lame delle tue seghe? Fai vedere alla natura chi è il capo col Campo di Disboscamento Av. che è equipaggiato con un set extra di tutti gli utensili per tagliare gli alberi!
Campo di Disboscamento Av.
Costruisci una Miniera di Carbone su di me!
Deposito di Carbone
Costruisci una Miniera di Ferro qui sopra!
Deposito di Ferro
Costruisci un Pozzo Petrolifero su di me!
Campo Petrolifero
Costruisci una Cava di Pietra su di me per produrre Pietra.
Affioramento Roccioso
Uno dei pochi ciuffi di alberi rimasti in questa regione desolata. Dovresti costruirci un Campo di Disboscamento sopra!
Foresta Fitta
Magazzino Sotterraneo

Per voi accaparratori che certamente DEVONO tenere assolutamente ogni vecchio giornale e campione di tessuto, il Magazzino Sotterraneo offre una tonnellata di spazio per immagazzinare tutto dalle risorse importanti al ciarpame inutile.
Magazzino Sotterraneo

Sai come si dice, che la strada per l'inferno è lastricata di buone intenzioni? Questa qui è rivestita di asfalto. Il che la rende... solo una strada ordinaria. Che va in paradiso. No, non proprio, ma non sarebbe bello?
Strada Lastricata
Per quelli a cui piacciono gli alberi, ma si vogliono piegare al potere di Madre Natura.
Albero in Vaso

Bassa quanto basta per non vederla prima di inciamparci e non abbastanza alta da impedire che i tuoi vicini possano vederti fare cose imbarazzanti, questa siepe ha l'altezza perfetta per essere puramente decorativa.
Siepe

Diedi del cibo a un Bigfoot, una volta. Mi seguì fino casa, e il mio Vecchio mi costrinse a dargli frustate finché se ne andò.

Mi addormentai piangendo quella notte, ma imparai la lezione.

Mai fidarsi del proprio Vecchio.
Cartello "Vietato Nutrire i Bigfoot"

+30% bonus oro se collocata vicino a negozi o case.

Tributo all'Imperatore

Statua di Morgan

Ricavato da uno di quei tritaverdure che vedete nelle televendite delle 2 del mattino. Avvialo una volta e gli zombi verranno tagliati a dadini. Avvialo due volte e verranno macinati! (Disponibile alla costruzione solo durante l'Epidemia degli Infetti.)
Affettazombi

Per quanto piccola è una trappola incredibilmente efficace, ma la pulizia è una gran rottura. È come se ci fosse stato macello con della marmellata di fragole lì dentro! (Disponibile alla costruzione solo durante l'Epidemia degli Infetti.)
Distruttore di Zombi

È una tagliola per orso le cui esche sono dei Nanopod Neri per catturare gli zombi- non una tagliola per catturare Orsi Zombi.

Perché è sicuro che non esistono Orsi Zombi... giusto? (Disponibile alla costruzione solo durante l'Epidemia degli Infetti.)
Tagliola per Zombi

Oh no, il piccolo Billy sta vagando fuori nell'apocalisse Zombi tutto solo! Spero proprio che nessun Zombi morderà la sua dinamit-esca pelle, sensibile alla pressione! (Disponibile alla costruzione solo durante l'Epidemia degli Infetti.)
Mina Antizombi

One of our Tanks is already selected. Tap on that Rebel guy to fire!

Enemy approaching, Lieutenant.
How many are we looking at?

A Peacemonger in his riot geeeaaar!
Ramsey, I see you standing there staring at me. What is it this time?
Two Turtleshellers, sir. Nothing else, either. Just two Turtleshellers.
Should I be relieved or annoyed?
Two Turtleshellers!

Look at 'em! Aren't they cute?
Three Mini Tanks!

Four Whirly-birds!

Called it.

More enemies approaching. Six Lightning Troopers this time.
Well, go take 'em out. Wear rubber-soled boots.
Six Lightning Troopers!

Seven Snipers sniping!

Ten Ninjas leaping!

I'm guessing us?

Perfect. Let's shoot 'em.
Great work everyone. I'm gonna go lie down.

OK, so that was fun. To recap, we just took down twelve Thugs thugging, eleven Hunters hunting, ten Ninjas leaping, nine Raider Boom Booms, eight Minutemen marching, seven Snipers sniping, and six Lightning troopers. What else was there?
Five Golden Taaaaanks! Four Whirly-birds, three Mini Tanks, two Turtleshellers —
And a Peacemonger in his riot gear.
Hi, Captain. I, uh, have some things I need to get done. Could you help me out?
Lieutenant Morgan ordered me to do all this stuff for some 'Secret Mission,' but he won't tell me what it is.
Thanks for the help!
Thanks for helping us with that thing that we're doing. Whatever it is.
Thanks, Captain! This is the last thing the Lieutenant asked me to do.
Do you think I might get a promotion for this?
Tsk... making you do the work I was making him do...

While you were busy, I got down to business and built you a Shack!
Sorpresa, capo!

The first rule of Secret Mission is you don't talk about Secret Mission.

Oh, Signore!
You've ruined my incredibly thoughtful gesture!

Imperatore?!

Noi veniamo con una bandiera di pace, e voi ci attaccate?

Great. Now we need to go save Sherriff Colt at Recoil Ridge.

I think we're going to need every soldier we can get, even if they ARE total noobs.

You can't put a price on Science!

I gotta say, it's a lot less funny when you show up here and lay into me with a guilt trip. Look, I've got no idea how to get Dragonfruit up to your Outpost, but I'll bet the gal over at the Orchard can help.

Ha ha! At last. Now, how can I turn this into a Boar lure?

Research, Perkins! Sure, we know this strain of Dragonfruit attracts them, but how much? How does it behave relative to less hardy strains of Dragonfruit? The quest for knowledge is what drives the Empire forward!
Until we build a Boar Ranch, we're keeping the animals in Perkins' bathroom.
AAAGH!!! Floyd, ma che diavolo! Perché non mi hai detto che c'erano dei cinghiali nella mia vasca da bagno?
